scenario: The global Programmatic Advertising Market is expected to reach USD 116.57 billion by 2029, growing at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 15.27% from 2023. The market is driven by advancements in Real-Time Bidding Technology, increased emphasis on data-driven marketing strategies, and the rise of mobile advertising. Key stakeholders in the market include advertisers, agencies, publishers, and ad tech companies. The market is expected to be dominated by the North American region, with notable companies such as Alphabet Inc., Meta Platforms, Inc., Amazon.com, Inc., Microsoft Corporation, and Alibaba Group Holding Limited driving innovations and improving transparency in programmatic transactions. Despite challenges related to ad fraud and data privacy, the market is expected to advance assertively. The report attributes include a forecast period of 2023-2029, estimated market value of USD 49.25 billion in 2023, and a forecasted market value of USD 116.57 billion by 2029.
